content:
https://twitter.com/anoldbruise/status/1305567050463494144

@backdropcms menu is javascript based, which makes building a mega menu override from pure css not possible. Is there anyone working on or aware of a module that affords mega menu to Backdrop, or should I build one?

- La Reina de las Perras üè¥ (@anoldbruise)
https://www.drupal.org/project/megamenu - good candidate for simple porting (latest dev. version.) I've played with it 3 years ago.
@StPaulTim the js menu library in core is "smartmenus" and does have mega-menu capabilities. I've used it (via custom code) on several sites, might be a good candidate for a new contrib solition
